Metadata.Title: CVE-2024-6655 affecting package gtk3 for versions less than 3.24.28-10
Metadata.Description: CVE-2024-6655 affecting package gtk3 for versions less than 3.24.28-10. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package gtk3 is earlier than 3.24.28-10, affected by CVE-2024-6655
